thread.title: La La Land wins Best Picture at the 2017 Oscars | The Independent
thread.title_full: La La Land wins Best Picture at the 2017 Oscars | The Independent

author: Christopher Hooton
title: La La Land wins Best Picture at the 2017 Oscars | The Independent
text:
La La Land wins Best Picture at the 2017 Oscars 
It has dominated pretty much every film award ceremony this year Monday 27 February 2017 05:08 GMT Click to followThe Independent Culture La La Land's opening scene, a dance number set during an L.A. traffic jam 
Damien Chazelle’s La La Land has landed the Oscar for Best Picture at the 89th Academy Awards , capping off a sensational night for the film, which picked up X awards. 
Starring Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling, the self-aware musical is a simultaneously reverential and subversive riff on classic Hollywood, dazzling audiences, critics and Academy voters with its ambition and technical prowess. 
La La Land was far and away the frontrunner for the award (ahead of Moonlight ), having also won Best Film/Picture at the Golden Globes, Baftas, Critics’ Choice Awards and more. 
The other nominees in the category were Arrival, Fences, Hacksaw Ridge, Hell or High Water, Hidden Figures, Lion, Manchester by the Sea and Moonlight. 
More to follow...
